nodes.text: Cruisers were vessels utilized during maritime fleets, before or sometimes during/after spacefleets were developed. They were largely repulsorlift craft that operated on oceans or other bodies of water, and were utilized by various factions during history, including the Gungan Grand Army, the Royal Naboo Security Forces, the Trade Federation Droid Army, the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Grand Army of the Republic, the Galactic Empire, the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and the Wookiees.
